summary: The Groundhog tells the story of how, for once, Jack Frost became human, and helped a knight win his lady love.
cast: Buddy Hackett|Robert Morse|Paul Frees|Larry Storch|Dave Garroway|Debra Clinger|Don Messick|Dee Stratton|Sonny Melendrez|Dina Lynn
keywords: robot butler|anthropomorphic animal|talking animal|robotic animal|character name as title
director: Directors: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jr.
title: Jack Frost
